Citizen Center on 05/13/2021

10 Welcome Street, Haverhill MA, 01830

Vaccinations offered: Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine, Janssen COVID-19 Vaccine

Age groups served: Adults

Services offered: Vaccination

Additional Information: 2nd dose Moderna for clinics week of 4/12 and first doses. Clinic open to those living, working or attending school in Haverhill only ages 18+

Clinic Hours : 10:00 am - 03:00 pm

Available Appointments: 124

Special Instructions: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.
